page.title: 03LEAVING ALFRED SUTTON BOYS
page.content: A lot of people like Alfred Sutton Boys School and don't want to leave. I am mainly one of those boys. I am going to Prospect school(a combination of Westwood Girls and Stoneham Boys schools). I do not like the idea of the school closing. I have to buy a new uniform which will cost a lot of money and I have to make new friends. Prospect school is mixed. I like the idea of mixed schools because we can share the classroom with girls. Prospect will be a lot different because it will have a lot more pupils and I wont have so many friends. I will have to catch two buses to go to my new school. It will cost a lot of money but it is the nearest to my house. s.Kirby aged 13years.
